abstract: It grounded the planes when it was told by the F.A.A. that a maintenance contractor had checked the planes’ altimeters using an instrument that was not properly calibrated.
snippet: It grounded the planes when it was told by the F.A.A. that a maintenance contractor had checked the planes’ altimeters using an instrument that was not properly calibrated.
lead_paragraph: United Airlines grounded seven Boeing 747s Thursday when it was told by the Federal Aviation Administration that a maintenance contractor, Korean Air Lines, had checked the planes’ altimeters using an instrument that was not properly calibrated.
